about_the_game:
A newly arranged Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective soundtrack takes possession of Steam!

All 37 tracks in the game's soundtrack have been rearranged, breathing new life into the haunting story. The arrangements were headed up by none other than the legendary Yasumasa Kitagawa (The Great Ace Attorney Chronicles, Mega Man X Legacy Collection Soundtrack)!

There's also a new track composed by the original Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective composer, Masakazu Sugimori (Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney, Viewtiful Joe)!
